testData.testDescription: Check the functionailty of Write big text in write mode in "source"

Parameters.value: On the Insert tab, the galleries include items that are designed to coordinate with the overall lo of your document. You can use these galleries to insert tables, headers, footers, lists, cover pages, and other document building blocks. When you create pictures, charts, or diagrams, they also coordinate with your current document lo.

When you create pictures, charts, or diagrams, they also coordinate with your current document lo.
